scenario.name: UAC scenario with proxy
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@voip-empresa.net SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP 10.0.1.10:5060 From: 100451824 <sip:100451824@voip-empresa.net> To: [service] <sip:[service]@voip-empresa.net> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Route: <sip:10.0.1.10:5060;lr> Contact: <sip:100451824@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Call with Proxy Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 97 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:97 iLBC/8000

ACK sip:[next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP voip-empresa.net:5060 From: 100451824 <sip:100451824@voip-empresa.net> To: [service] <sip:[service]@voip-empresa.net> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK [routes] Contact: <sip:100451824[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Call with Proxy Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP voip-empresa.net:5060 From: 100451824 <sip:100451824@voip-empresa.net> To: [service] <sip:[service]@voip-empresa.net> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE [routes] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Call with Proxy Content-Length: 0
